verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar מִקְטַ֣ר <S%H4729><s%> to burn קְטֹ֑רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <S%H7848><s%> upon [of] shittim תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

אַמָּ֨ה <S%H520><s%> A cubit אָרְכּ֜וֹ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> thereof and a cubit רָחְבּוֹ֙ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth רָב֣וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> thereof foursquare יִהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> two וְאַמָּתַ֖יִם <S%H520><s%> shall it be and two cubits קֹמָת֑וֹ <S%H6967><s%> [shall be] the height מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at קַרְנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7161><s%> thereof the horns

וְצִפִּיתָ֨ <S%H6823><s%> And thou shalt overlay אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָה֗וֹר <S%H2889><s%> it with pure אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גַּגּ֧וֹ <S%H1406><s%> the top וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִירֹתָ֛יו <S%H7023><s%> thereof and the sides סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> and the horns וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> thereof and thou shalt make לּ֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <S%H2213><s%> unto it a crown זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וּשְׁתֵּי֩ <S%H8147><s%> And two טַבְּעֹ֨ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֜ב <S%H2091><s%> golden תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make לּ֣וֹ ׀ מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לְזֵר֗וֹ <S%H2213><s%> to it under the crown עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> of it by the two צַלְעֹתָ֔יו <S%H6763><s%> corners תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> of it shalt thou make עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> thereof upon the two צִדָּ֑יו <S%H6654><s%> sides וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall be for לְבָתִּ֣ים <S%H1004><s%> [it] and they shall be for places לְבַדִּ֔ים <S%H905><s%> for the staves לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָּהֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> it withal

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <S%H905><s%> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> them with gold

וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> it before הַפָּרֹ֔כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> is עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> near אֲרֹ֣ן <S%H727><s%> that [is] by the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> is עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> that [is] over the testimony אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <S%H3259><s%> where I will meet לְךָ֖ שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְהִקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense סַמִּ֑ים <S%H5561><s%> thereon sweet בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> every morning בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning בְּהֵיטִיב֛וֹ <S%H3190><s%> when he dresseth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּרֹ֖ת <S%H5216><s%> the lamps יַקְטִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H6999><s%> he shall burn incense

וּבְהַעֲלֹ֨ת <S%H5927><s%> lighteth אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> And when Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּרֹ֛ת <S%H5216><s%> the lamps בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> at הָעֲרְבַּ֖יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even יַקְטִירֶ֑נָּה <S%H6999><s%> he shall burn incense קְטֹ֧רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense תָּמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> upon it a perpetual לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> Ye shall offer עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֥רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense זָרָ֖ה <S%H2114><s%> no strange וְעֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> thereon nor burnt sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> nor meat offering וְנֵ֕סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> drink offering לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִסְּכ֖וּ <S%H5258><s%> neither shall ye pour עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְכִפֶּ֤ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹתָ֔יו <S%H7161><s%> upon the horns אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> of it once בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> in a year מִדַּ֞ם <S%H1818><s%> with the blood חַטַּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִ֗ים <S%H3725><s%> of atonements אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> once בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> in the year יְכַפֵּ֤ר <S%H3722><s%> shall he make atonement עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> upon it throughout your generations קֹֽדֶשׁ־ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <S%H6944><s%> holy ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תִשָּׂ֞א <S%H5375><s%> When thou takest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the sum בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם֒ <S%H6485><s%> after their number וְנָ֨תְנ֜וּ <S%H5414><s%> then shall they give אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man כֹּ֧פֶר <S%H3724><s%> a ransom נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <S%H5315><s%> for his soul לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בִּפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> when thou numberest אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָהֶ֛ם נֶ֖גֶף <S%H5063><s%> them that there be no plague בִּפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> among them when [thou] numberest אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This יִתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> This they shall give כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הָעֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> every one that passeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among הַפְּקֻדִ֔ים <S%H6485><s%> them that are numbered מַחֲצִ֥ית <S%H4276><s%> half הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> a shekel בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> [is] twenty גֵּרָה֙ <S%H1626><s%> gerah הַשֶּׁ֔קֶל <S%H8255><s%> (a shekel מַחֲצִ֣ית <S%H4276><s%> half הַשֶּׁ֔קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekel תְּרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> [shall be] the offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone הָעֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> Every one that passeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַפְּקֻדִ֔ים <S%H6485><s%> among them that are numbered מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and above יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> shall give תְּרוּמַ֥ת <S%H8641><s%> an offering יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

הֶֽעָשִׁ֣יר <S%H6223><s%> The rich לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַרְבֶּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> shall not give more וְהַדַּל֙ <S%H1800><s%> and the poor לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַמְעִ֔יט <S%H4591><s%> shall not give less מִֽמַּחֲצִ֖ית <S%H4276><s%> than half הַשָּׁ֑קֶל <S%H8255><s%> a shekel לָתֵת֙ <S%H5414><s%> when [they] give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> an offering יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> for your souls

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money הַכִּפֻּרִ֗ים <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement מֵאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנָתַתָּ֣ <S%H5414><s%> and shalt appoint אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> it for the service אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> that it may be a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> for your souls פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt also make כִּיּ֥וֹר <S%H3595><s%> a laver נְחֹ֛שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass וְכַנּ֥וֹ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [also of] brass לְרָחְצָ֑ה <S%H7364><s%> to wash וְנָתַתָּ֣ <S%H5414><s%> [withal] and thou shalt put אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> it between the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <S%H5414><s%> and thou shalt put שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וְרָחֲצ֛וּ <S%H7364><s%> shall wash אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> For Aaron וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7272><s%> and their feet

בְּבֹאָ֞ם <S%H935><s%> When they go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֹ֧הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation יִרְחֲצוּ־ <S%H7364><s%> they shall wash מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> that they die א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְגִשְׁתָּ֤ם <S%H5066><s%> not or when they come near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> to the altar לְשָׁרֵ֔ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister לְהַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> to burn offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְרָחֲצ֛וּ <S%H7364><s%> So they shall wash יְדֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> and their feet וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> that they die וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֧ם חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> not and it shall be a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever ל֥וֹ וּלְזַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> to them [even] to him and to his seed לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout their generations פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Moreover the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְךָ֮ בְּשָׂמִ֣ים <S%H1314><s%> spices רֹאשׁ֒ <S%H7218><s%> thou also unto thee principal מָר־ <S%H4753><s%> myrrh דְּרוֹר֙ <S%H1865><s%> of pure חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְקִנְּמָן־ <S%H7076><s%> cinnamon בֶּ֥שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> [shekels] and of sweet מַחֲצִית֖וֹ <S%H4276><s%> half חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <S%H3967><s%> [even] two hundred וּקְנֵה־ <S%H7070><s%> calamus בֹ֖שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> [shekels] and of sweet חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> two hundred

וְקִדָּ֕ה <S%H6916><s%> And of cassia חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> [shekels] after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וְשֶׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and of oil זַ֖יִת <S%H2132><s%> olive הִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> an hin

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֚מֶן <S%H8081><s%> it an oil מִשְׁחַת־ <S%H4888><s%> ointment קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of holy רֹ֥קַח <S%H7545><s%> an ointment מִרְקַ֖חַת <S%H4842><s%> compound מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> after the art רֹקֵ֑חַ <S%H7543><s%> of the apothecary שֶׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil מִשְׁחַת־ <S%H4888><s%> anointing קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it shall be an holy יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> And thou shalt anoint ב֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> therewith and the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <S%H7979><s%> And the table וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> and all his vessels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <S%H4501><s%> and the candlestick וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H3627><s%> and his vessels וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> and the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> of incense

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> And the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> with all his vessels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <S%H3595><s%> and the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot

וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֣ <S%H6942><s%> And thou shalt sanctify אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> them that they may be most קָֽדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> whatsoever toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H6942><s%> them shall be holy

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons תִּמְשָׁ֑ח <S%H4886><s%> And thou shalt anoint וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H6942><s%> and consecrate אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְכַהֵ֥ן <S%H3547><s%> them that [they] may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שֶׁ֠מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil מִשְׁחַת־ <S%H4888><s%> anointing קֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> This shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> This לִ֖י לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> unto me throughout your generations

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> Upon man's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִיסָ֔ךְ <S%H3251><s%> shall it not be poured וּבְמַ֨תְכֻּנְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4971><s%> [any other] like it after the composition לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> neither shall ye make כָּמֹ֑הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of it it [is] holy ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [and] it shall be holy יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃

אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> or אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whoever יִרְקַ֣ח <S%H7543><s%> compoundeth כָּמֹ֔הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whoever יִתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> [any] like it or whosoever putteth מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> [any] of it upon a stranger וְנִכְרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> shall even be cut מֵעַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> off from his people ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְךָ֣ סַמִּ֗ים <S%H5561><s%> unto thee sweet spices נָטָ֤ף ׀ <S%H5198><s%> stacte וּשְׁחֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H7827><s%> and onycha וְחֶלְבְּנָ֔ה <S%H2464><s%> and galbanum סַמִּ֖ים <S%H5561><s%> [these] sweet וּלְבֹנָ֣ה <S%H3828><s%> frankincense זַכָּ֑ה <S%H2134><s%> with pure בַּ֥ד <S%H905><s%> of each בְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> shall there be a like יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> קְטֹ֔רֶת <S%H7004><s%> it a perfume רֹ֖קַח <S%H7545><s%> a confection מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> after the art רוֹקֵ֑חַ <S%H7543><s%> of the apothecary מְמֻלָּ֖ח <S%H4414><s%> tempered טָה֥וֹר <S%H2889><s%> together pure קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> [and] holy

וְשָֽׁחַקְתָּ֣ <S%H7833><s%> And thou shalt beat מִמֶּנָּה֮ <S%H4480><s%> some הָדֵק֒ <S%H1854><s%> [some] of it very small וְנָתַתָּ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> and put מִמֶּ֜נָּה <S%H4480><s%> some לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> of it before הָעֵדֻת֙ <S%H5715><s%> the testimony בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <S%H3259><s%> where I will meet לְךָ֖ שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> it קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> with thee it shall be unto you most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃

וְהַקְּטֹ֙רֶת֙ <S%H7004><s%> And [as for] the perfume אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which thou shalt make בְּמַ֨תְכֻּנְתָּ֔הּ <S%H4971><s%> to yourselves according to the composition לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall not make לָכֶ֑ם קֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thereof it shall be unto thee holy תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֖ לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD

אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shall make כָמ֖וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> like לְהָרִ֣יחַ <S%H7306><s%> like unto that to smell בָּ֑הּ וְנִכְרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> thereto shall even be cut off מֵעַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> from his people ס
